name: WoOuija
description:
1. a board with letters, numbers, and other signs around its edge, to which a planchette, movable pointer, or upturned glass moves, supposedly in answer to questions from the living to spirits or dead people at a seance.

For the 24h GrimJam 2016. The theme was 90s horror and it is made by a single person, although we usually are two at shikaka games. I was a kid in the 90s, and therefore one of those who tried this for real - it was quite popular for a while.

The image is a public domain photo of an antique ouija board. The font is by Dieter Steffmann. The game is made in GM:S and the music can be found here: http://ingemann-strunch.com/
